name: .PFI File Extension
summary: Learn about .PFI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Raster image file created by PhotoFiltre Studio, an image editing program for Windows; contains graphics drawn by the user and supports multiple editing layers within the same image; used as the native save format for the software.

content: PFI files can be saved to several standard bitmap image formats, including .JPG, .PNG, .TIF, and .BMP.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
